| ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ English |    remove React.FC (#35115 )       |
| ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Chinese |     ç§»é™¤ React.FC (#35115 )     |

### â˜‘ï¸ Self-Check before Merge

âš ï¸ Please check all items below before requesting a reviewing. âš ï¸

- [x] Doc is updated/provided or not needed
- [x] Demo is updated/provided or not needed
- [x] TypeScript definition is updated/provided or not needed
- [x] Changelog is provided or not needed

---

<!--
Below are template for copilot to generate CR message.
Please DO NOT modify it.
-->

### ğŸš€ Summary

<!--
copilot:summary
-->
### <samp>ğŸ¤– Generated by Copilot at 640f67e</samp>

Refactored all components in the `.dumi` theme and pages to use regular function types instead of `React.FC` types, to simplify the code and avoid potential issues with implicit children props. Moved the `BackgroundImage` component to the 404 page, as it is only used there.

### ğŸ” Walkthrough

<!--
copilot:walkthrough
-->
### <samp>ğŸ¤– Generated by Copilot at 640f67e</samp>

*  Refactor all components to use regular function types with explicit props instead of `React.FC` types, as the latter are considered unnecessary and potentially misleading by some React developers ([link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-8131ea4f1508e43c8e04d3a7a29e5d7fdbebf7c4792d734d4f4d891301f19ae2L19-R19), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-334e4791bcfe5714cefed473096aba70368d2cea07143640f8396e570b5e61f7L27-R27), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-bb71d3e7437a45c3978afff7a00abefa4e0c15a401677f1a732c773f7027d36eL41-R40), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-30afbf329ccd8dcb6bf69a0c2b4464e6ef851c61ed0d4c133113aa6afd4b8f28L38-R38), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-b2ed7bd8914c183806fa3f3f1f1dd82e63067fc0083a3e10249a24555d498cc4L5-R5), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-138391ef541c50bce3fccf1fcaea8bb386d44d00b821f9a4d9000b8e0c5764b5L3-R3), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-51d36d0662438e162135ad6713e967a78491b32e953192265b2ecc71c9800e26L33-R33), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-f1df5cf9560d26c9862a4824e7d1a13f6a8bec1ec7338e9327f3e7a6a74c1585L81-R81), * Remove unused `import type { FC } from 'react';` statements from files where the `React.FC` type was removed ([link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-bb71d3e7437a45c3978afff7a00abefa4e0c15a401677f1a732c773f7027d36eL2), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-6cde915d5c0b04ad09169e4b5c2a35a68622af857002fe066582fd0f68913467L1), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-d4c2b096e898ee55c192cd1d13952ec5c5be4c1ff563d0ccaba74d8555e19adaL1), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-16fa19cd7384aaec1f2aa2733ad3a35affb9541febf0bd5aaa779eb0c7d9890aL1), [link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-3bb66880942ca129db42a1a6c20126916fc7b9be5daf9723506df03fa96f0995L1-R1))
* Move the `BackgroundImage` component from `.dumi/pages/index/components/Theme/BackgroundImage.tsx` to `.dumi/pages/404/index.tsx`, as it is only used by the `NotFoundPage` component ([link](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/pull/41900/files?diff=unified&w=0#diff-334e4791bcfe5714cefed473096aba70368d2cea07143640f8396e570b5e61f7L27-R27))
